data.title: Windsor Royal
data.meta_description: Windsor Royal celebrates the integration of Windsor Yards and Windsor Royal Station Shopping Centres into one, fantastic offering.
data.text:
Related

Anthony Paul Design Goldsmiths Ltd (Windsor), Windsor and MaidenheadAn independent family run jewellers with shops in Windsor, Henley-on-Thames and Maidenhead. Specialists in handcrafted jewellery, repairs, valuations and second hand jewellery.

Cattle Grid, Windsor and MaidenheadThe Cattle Grid team love steak and we think everyone should be able to enjoy it regularly. We aim to bring you the very highest quality steaks without breaking the bank.

Caffè Nero (Station Shopping, Windsor Royal), Windsor and MaidenheadSince the very beginning our goal has been to create a place that radiates comfort, relaxation and warmth. A place to meet friends, work or just watch the world go by. A local neighbourhood spot.

Cinnamon Café, Windsor and MaidenheadFounded in 2001, Cinnamon Café is a locally-owned, family-run and independently-operated business located in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal. Discover a full food menu as well as hot drinks to enjoy.

All Bar One Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadAll Bar One Windsor is a stylish cocktail bar housed in a listed building within Station Shopping, Windsor Royal.

Fat Face, Windsor and MaidenheadAt Fat Face we design kit for those who love to get out there, stuff that's built to withstand the demands of an active lifestyle.

Havana House Cigar Merchants, Windsor and MaidenheadWindsor's Havana House, located in Station Shopping Windsor Royal, is the original and flagship store and is the perfect location for any cigar aficionado.

Hobbs, Windsor and MaidenheadContemporary yet timeless, the Hobbs store in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal is the ultimate in luxurious, yet affordable clothing.

Jo Malone, Windsor and MaidenheadJo Malone London is a British fragrance and lifestyle house synonymous with simple, elegant colognes, candles, bath and body products and room scents that celebrate the spirit of generosity and giving.

Le Creuset, Windsor and MaidenheadCheck out the Le Creuset store in Windsor Royal shopping centre; view their range of pans, casserole dishes, bakeware, roasters, storage, serveware, dinnerware, stoneware mugs and kitchen essentials.

Jigsaw, Windsor and MaidenheadFashion is temporary, but style is permanent and with this belief in mind, Jigsaw offer their customers stylish, timeless womenswear for the independently-minded.

Molton Brown, Windsor and MaidenheadMolton Brown blend exotic ingredients with a touch of London eccentricity for bold fragrances and bright colours that make their perfumes, shower gels, body lotions, candles and hand care products stand out on the shelf.

Phase Eight, Windsor and MaidenheadEstablished by Patsy Seddon in London in 1979, Phase Eight provide exclusive designs, beautiful fabrics, unique prints and a design philosophy that transcends the ages.

River Island, Windsor and MaidenheadWith over 60 years of fashion retailing experience, River Island is one of the most successful companies on the High Street.

Smithsilver, Windsor and MaidenheadSilver jewellery with Swarovski crystals and freshwater pearls.

Swarovski Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadSee the world through crystal eyes and experience the fascinating world of Swarovski crystal.

Space NK Apothecary, Windsor and MaidenheadSpace NK is renowned for its luxury range of beauty products, including skincare, cosmetics and gadgets. Featuring over 70 brands, Space NK is the ultimate destination for beauty discovery.

Waitrose, Windsor and MaidenheadFood Retailer providing a full range of quality products including fresh fish and meat, rotisserie and bakery.

Whistles, Windsor and MaidenheadWhistles at Station Shopping, Windsor Royal is the ultimate shopping destination for busy, dynamic women looking for timeless pieces with an intelligent sense of design.

H & M, Windsor and MaidenheadShop the fresh collections at H&M for women, men and children. H&M focus on design and fashion at affordable prices with sustainability and quality at the heart of all the ranges. Pick up party pieces, must-have trend edits and add the finishing touches with shoes and accessories.

Vision Express, Windsor and MaidenheadWe are opticians with a wide range of Own Brand and Designer Frames and Sunglasses, with the additional benefit of our own on-site laboratory offering you a 1-hour service to make your spectacles.

Zara, Windsor and MaidenheadLadies, menswear and childrenswear.

Daniel of Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadSitting proudly in the heart of Windsor, Daniel Department Store is an English Department Store chain, with its flagship store situated in central Windsor. It was originally established in 1901 by Walter James Daniel and since then has always remained a family-run independent store.

Robert Gatward, Windsor and MaidenheadAn independent jeweller that prides itself on offering excellent customer service in a beautiful relaxing environment offering an extensive range of quality brands many of which, in Windsor, are exclusive.

Windsor Travelmoney, Windsor and MaidenheadVisit Windsor Travelmoney in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal for all your currency exchange needs including foreign currency exchange, including purchase of unused foreign cash when returning from abroad. Best rates are guaranteed. 0% commission on all exchanges.

Pandora, Windsor and MaidenheadPandora brings its signature charm bracelets and beautifully designed jewellery to their concept store in Windsor Royal to provide shoppers with the highest quality customer service and shopping experience.

Pret, Windsor and MaidenheadPret creates good natural food and freshly roasted organic coffees. All our bagettes, sandwiches and hot toasties are fresh daily in our on-site kitchen. We also serve a range of soups, snacks, pastries and cakes.

Costa Coffee (Yards Shopping, Windsor Royal), Windsor and MaidenheadCreating great coffee is an art that takes time and skill to perfect, and with 40 years of experience we like to think that we've done just that.

Travelodge Windsor Central, Windsor and MaidenheadTravelodge Windsor Central offers guests comfy king size beds and an on-site restaurant serving up breakfast and dinner. For a place to stay after shopping all day, head to the Travelodge in Yards Shopping, Windsor Royal.

Bill's Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadBill’s Windsor restaurant is right next to Windsor & Eton Central station and has plenty of seating, both inside and out. Open for breakfast, lunch, dinner and everything in between, this is a pretty restaurant, with plenty of Bill’s sparkle.

Mint Velvet, Windsor and MaidenheadMint Velvet offers luxury women's clothing combining modern silhouettes with luxurious fabrications to create a relaxed and sensual style of women's fashion.

Cotswold Outdoor, Windsor and MaidenheadCotswold Outdoor is an award winning multi-channel retailer with over 70 stores in the UK. Come and visit us in Windsor!

TimpsonShoe repairs, key cutting, watch repairs, engraved personalised gifts like photo Zippo lighters and slate house signs, dry cleaning and assisted photo ID.

Sweaty Betty, Windsor and MaidenheadFull of workout wear as beautiful as the setting, the Sweaty Betty boutique is located in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal. Surrounded by luxury retailers and just a stone’s throw from Windsor Castle, stop by for new season kit and free weekly workouts.

A Dog's Life Co, Windsor and MaidenheadA Dog’s Life Co is a luxury dog boutique offering a highly curated assortment of dog accessories as well as seasonal collections from unique brands including toys, treats and gifts for pets and people.

Kiltane, Windsor and MaidenheadVisit the Kiltane store in Windsor Royal Station where you will discover exquisite quality 100% cashmere and lambswool knitwear, scarves, stoles, wraps, accessories, bags and purses.

Craft Coop Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadCraft Coop is more than a beautiful, award-winning shop full of unique, handcrafted products. As a social enterprise business, Craft Coop gives over 200 local craftspeople the opportunity to trade in a High Street shop, provides business and social support, works with various charities and other…

Intoku Pan Asian & Sushi Cafe Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadIntoku believes in the power of shared plates, taking you on a culinary journey where the table is adorned with a variety of flavours, every dish telling a story.

Patch on the Plaza, Windsor and MaidenheadWelcome to Patch, a delightful family-owned restaurant nestled in the heart of Windsor. We take great pride in offering an exceptional dining experience, where locals and visitors alike can revel in the pleasures of fresh, delectable food. Our little haven is a hidden gem waiting for you to uncover!

Paeonia Bubble Tea Room, Windsor and MaidenheadPaeonia is the UK's first premium bubble tea room located just a minute away from Windsor Castle in the pretty shopping area of Station Shopping, Windsor Royal.

Ole & Steen, Windsor and MaidenheadBringing the most authentically Danish baked goods to Windsor. Our bakeries showcase the best in craftsmanship – freshly baked products, made from scratch and baked fresh every morning.

Banana Tree, Windsor and MaidenheadExperience an explosion of South-East Asian flavour at Banana Tree Windsor!

Black Sheep Coffee, Windsor and MaidenheadCome and soak up the vibe and enjoy a perfect cup of coffee at Black Sheep Coffee located in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal.

Doughnut Time, Windsor and MaidenheadPop by Doughnut Time's regal Windsor store and discover fresh doughnuts that are fit for royalty!

Five Guys, Windsor and MaidenheadFive Guys Windsor is an American burger restaurant putting quality first and keeping things simple so customers get the most delicious burgers and fries out there.

Heidi (Station Shopping, Windsor Royal), Windsor and MaidenheadHeidi is a cafe, bakery and coffee shop that has been operating in Windsor for over twenty years. Heidi Windsor Royal Station is all the best of Heidi, shrunk down into a grab-and-go format right next to the ticket office at Windsor & Eton Central station and in the middle of the town’s fantastic…

Mamma Mia, Windsor and MaidenheadWelcome to Mamma Mia, your go-to destination for fast and flavourful Italian cuisine on the go. We specialize in crafting mouthwatering paninis, sandwiches, gelato, and pizza that will satisfy your cravings and leave you wanting more.

Windsor Pie Company, Windsor and MaidenheadThe perfect pie is now available to buy in Windsor! Drop by Windsor Pie Company, in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal, and enjoy a selection of delicious homemade pies served alongside creamy mashed potatoes and a variety of sides.

Castle Fine Art, Windsor and MaidenheadCastle Fine Art's gallery houses an esteemed collection of original and limited edition art. Located in the stylish surroundings of Windsor Royal, the artspace regularly hosts exhibitions of exciting new art.

The Fragrance Shop, Windsor and MaidenheadThe Fragrance Shop in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal brings you fabulous fragrances at fabulous prices helping you Spray A Little Happiness. Their friendly, knowledgeable team is always on hand to help make finding the perfect fragrance a hassle free, enjoyable experience.

Delicious Pho, Windsor and MaidenheadSatisfy your Vietnamese food cravings at Delicious Pho in Station Shopping, Windsor Royal, where you’ll find a menu boasting a variety of Pho options.

Brook Taverner, Windsor and MaidenheadSince 1912, Brook Taverner have been tailors of distinction, catering to all menswear needs. Through evolving trends and varying economic climates, we have remained steadfast in our pursuit of sartorial excellence. We’re excited to announce we will now be coming to Windsor!

Crêperie Doux Sourire, Windsor and MaidenheadCrêperie Doux Sourire is all about fresh and natural ingredients, supporting small producers, and keeping things local. Every crêpe, galette and waffle is handmade to order and either filled with the customer's choice of savoury ingredients or finished with their chosen sweet toppings.

Fuwa Fuwa, Windsor and MaidenheadThe UK’s first and original Fuwa Fuwa® Japanese pancake store. Their handcrafted souffle pancakes are made to order using their special secret recipe and finest ingredients to ensure they are always fresh, warm and super fluffy!

C.P. Hart, Windsor and MaidenheadVisit our stylish showroom in Windsor displaying the latest bathroom ideas from across Europe. Meet the designers to talk through your project and we’ll recommend a selection of luxury and modern solutions to seamlessly create your dream bathroom.

Clarendon Fine Art, Windsor and MaidenheadOffering an international portfolio of statement pieces for distinctive interiors and an unsurpassed fine art journey.

Eye Academy, Windsor and MaidenheadAn independent opticians run by experienced optometrists.

Mango, Windsor and MaidenheadMango, one of Europe’s leading fashion groups, is a global company with design and creativity at the centre of its business model and a strategy based on constant innovation, the search for sustainability and a complete ecosystem of channels and partners. Founded in Barcelona in 1984, the company…

Martyn Crossley The Florist, Windsor and MaidenheadMartyn Crossley leads a team of wonderful talented and qualified florists.

Oliver Bonas, Windsor and MaidenheadOliver Bonas is an independent lifestyle store, designing our own take on fashion and homeware.

Moo Boo, Windsor and MaidenheadFinest Taiwanese bubble tea in the United Kingdom! Mooboo is a United Kingdom-based company with rich Far East culture. Every drink we made was truly “epic” and “magic” bubble tea. This is because the finest ingredients and recipes are only and exclusive to Mooboo. Our passion, your drink!

Superdry, Windsor and MaidenheadSuperdry is built on style. They celebrate unique and independent style and they're always inspired by the spirit of adventure and crafting premium products sustainably.

The White Company, Windsor and MaidenheadOur store in Windsor Yards is home to a range of our beautiful current collections. Take the opportunity to see, feel and smell some of our products before treating yourself, your home or a loved one to something special. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Three, Windsor and MaidenheadWe always believed that the internet should be at the heart of the customer’s mobile experience. To this day, we aspire to give more people, in more places a better internet experience than any other network. Visit the Three Store for all your mobile needs including handsets, data, sims and more.

Build-a-Bear, Windsor and MaidenheadSince 1997, Build-A-Bear Workshop has been adding a little more heart to life! The iconic retailer offers a hands-on, step-by-step experience of bringing personalised furry friends to life.

BeauBelle & Tailor of Windsor, Windsor and MaidenheadBeauBelle offers ladies and girls' bespoke clothing, specialising in occasion wear. All clothing is handmade by qualified tailors in their Windsor studio, Tailor of Windsor. Tailor of Windsor also offers repairs and alterations, done by professionals. There is also a dry cleaning service provided.
